comments:
if you have a large project in your workspace (e.g. firefox) and a feature attempts to get the project description early after Eclipse/CDT has started, a ConcurrentModificationException is thrown. 

I've raised this on core as I'm unsure if this is specific to the cdt build system.

Two examples are:

I have made the initial fix for what I think might be the problem. Since I was not able to reproduce the issue, I can not guarantee the "real" issue you encountered is fixed, so please verify and re-open if needed..
